trans-unit.source: This example database demonstrates how to manage users programmatically. It shows you how to: - Backup and save the users and their encrypted passwords. - Use a custom login dialog - Delete or create new users - Manage additional information per user (icon, visibility, etc.)
trans-unit.target: This example database demonstrates how to manage users programmatically. It shows you how to: - Backup and save the users and their encrypted passwords. - Use a custom login dialog - Delete or create new users - Manage additional information per user (icon, visibility, etc.)
